WITH SEARCHLIST AS ( select ROW_NUMBER() OVER( ORDER BY A.seq DESC ) AS NO, A.seq, A.title, A.regdate, A.good, A.bad, A.status, A.cnt, A.Pseq, A.step from Council A where 1=1
and A.title like '%' | |#{sTitle} || '%'
order by A.pseq desc, A.seq asc ) SELECT * FROM SEARCHLIST WHERE 1=1 AND SEARCHLIST.NO BETWEEN TO_NUMBER(#{sPageNo}) * TO_NUMBER(#{sPageSize}) - TO_NUMBER(#{sPageSize}) + 1 AND TO_NUMBER(#{sPageNo}) * TO_NUMBER(#{sPageSize})
mapper.insert: insert into Council ( seq, title, content, etc, cnt, regid, regdate, modid, moddate ) values ((select nvl(max(seq),0)+1 from council ), #{sTitle}, #{sContent}, #{sEtc}, 0, 'id11', sysdate, 'id11', sysdate)
mapper.update: update Council set Title = #{sTitle}, Content = #{sContent} ,regid = 'modid', regdate = sysdate where seq = #{sSeq}
